p1.title: NOVA WEATHER
p1.subtitle: Swift UI Weather Application
p1.desc: A sleek and user-friendly weather application designed for iOS that helps users track the temperature of their current location as well as any other areas of interest. Includes AI-driven descriptions, custom features, and admin functionalities, and a widget.

f1.title: GEMINI AI INTEGRATION
f1.content: Generates concise, real-time weather descriptions for each location

f2.title: PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE
f2.content: Track current weather, favorite multiple locations, and access detailed forecasts, including “feels like” temperatures.

f3.title: INTUITIVE DESIGN
f3.content: SwiftUI-powered interface with a custom app icon, widgets, and intuitive navigation.

f4.title: USER AUTHENTICATION
f4.content: Encrypted Firebase database for user sign-in and validation.
